SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class CommonGoalPointStack

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.CommonGoalPointStack
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CommonGoalPointStack extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the stack of points associated with a common goal. It tracks the points earned for completing the goal by the players.
See Also:
